Managing Complexity

Dell Technologies | Design Lead | 2012

The Dell K3000 Mobile Device Management Appliance was a clean-sheet design for a server-appliance to manage mobile devices such as phones and tablets. 

I was the lead designer for this project, responsible for workflow and design decisions. I worked with a graphic designer, user researcher, project manager and developers. 

Simple but powerful

The search feature was designed to be flexible and intuitive. Freeform typing shows categorized matches to build a list which the user could further require (is) or exclude (is not) items. 

This screen allows the administrator to view all apps installed on a fleet of devices. From here they can manage both iOS and Android, push updates and manage settings.

Static mockups

Early layout drawings to communicate the concepts.
